    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109834</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Formation of a dipeptide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anordnung eines Dipeptids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation d'un dipeptide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação de um dipeptide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione di un dipeptide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός μιας διπεπτίδης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación de un dipeptide</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how two amino acids can join to form a dipeptide. The link between the two amino acids is called a peptide bond.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amino acids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">condensation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dipeptide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrolysis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">peptide bond</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">protein synthesis</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wie zwei Aminosäuren 
verbinden können, um ein Dipeptid zu bilden. Das Link zwischen 
den zwei Aminosäuren wird eine Peptidbindung genannt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre comment deux acides aminés 
peuvent se joindre pour former un dipeptide. Le lien entre les 
deux acides aminés s'appelle une obligation de peptide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra como dois aminos-ácido 
podem juntar para dar forma a um dipeptide. A ligação entre os
dois aminos-ácido é chamada uma ligação do peptide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra come due amminoacidi possono
unirsi per formare un dipeptide. Il collegamento fra i due 
amminoacidi è chiamato un legame del peptide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επιδεικνύει πώς δύο αμινοξέα 
μπορούν να ενώσουν για να διαμορφώσουν μια διπεπτίδη. Η 
σύνδεση μεταξύ των δύο αμινοξέων καλείται δεσμό πεπτιδίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra cómo dos aminoácidos 
pueden ensamblar para formar un dipeptide. La conexión entre 
los dos aminoácidos se llama un enlace del peptide.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
